strategy: Kabal of the Black Heart armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: Dark Eldar Kabal, Tormentor Titan and Executioner formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. Partisans receive a +1 modifier when attempting an Engage action.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Kabal of the Bladed Lotus

formations.name: 0-1 Wraithgate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Dark Eldar player's half of the table with a Wraithgate, this counts as an objective marker and a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way.

formations.name: 0-1 Portable Webway Portal
formations.units: Add a portable Webway Portal to an Archon, Dracon, Succubus or Ancient character in the army. This portable Webway may be used once in a game. After the character's formation completes an action you may place a barrage template marker completely within 15cm of the character and outside any enemy zones of control. This marker counts as a Webway Portal which may not be attacked or damaged in any way. Remove this Webway Portal marker in the end phase of the turn before any rallying.

sections.name: Black Heart Kabal Formations
sections.description: The army must contain one Kabal Coterie

sections.name: Black Heart Partisan Formations
sections.description: Up to two Partisan Formations may be taken for each Kabal Formation

formations.name: Hellion Murder
extraUnits: Add up to two Hellion Skyboards: 25 points each

formations.name: Reaver Gang
extraUnits: Add up to two Reaver Jet Bikes: 25 points each
Add one Succubus to a unit of Reaver Jet Bikes: 50 points

formations.name: Wych Cult
extraUnits: Add one Succubus to a unit of Wyches: 50 points

sections.name: Black Heart Aircraft, War Engines and Spacecraft
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Black Heart Aircraft, War Engines and Spacecraft

upgrades.title: Black Heart Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Dracon
items.description: Add one Dracon to an Infantry unit in the formation

items.name: Ravagers
items.description: Add up to two Dark Eldar Ravagers

items.name: Warp Beasts
items.description: Add up to two Warp Beasts

items.name: Talos
items.description: Add up to two Dark Eldar Talos

items.name: Dark Eldar Transport
items.description: Any combination of transport options may be taken to transport a formation, as long as no vehicle has an empty transport slot. Not all units in a formation require a transport vehicle. Transport options selected may only transport units from the same formation. Up to three Raiders may be added to a formation for free to carry units of Incubi, Warriors, Wyches, Haemonculi and/or Wracks, additional Raiders are added for free to transport units from the Dark Eldar Upgrades section, as long as that unit can be transported in a Raider. Any number of Raiders may be replaced by two Dark Eldar Venoms or Dark Eldar Barges of Pleasure.
